title: Austropotamobius torrentium Illumina Hi-C data
library_construction_protocol: Size selection done using SPRISelect Beads according to the protocol, Dovetail Omni-C kit Version 2.0, step 5.5.

title: Austropotamobius torrentium Illumina RNA-Seq data
library_construction_protocol: The RNA sequencing library is prepared using the TruSeq Stranded mRNA Library Preparation Kit with poly-A selection (cat# 20020595, Illumina Inc.). Library preparation is performed according to the manufacturer's protocol (#1000000040498). Before library preparation, the quality and quantity of the samples are evaluated using either the Fragment Analyzer system (DNF-471 kit) or the TapeStation 4200 (RNA ScreenTape), both systems from Agilent Technologies.
